class.name: FormNeedsLowercaseCharacterFieldEntry
class.brief_description: Checks if the given html form field's value has a lowercase character.
class.description: Used by [FormField]s to implement html form validation capabilities. Checks if the given html form field's value has a lowercase character.

member.name: does_not_have_lowercase_error
member.default: "%s needs at least one lowercase character!"
